actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to permit Charles E. Day, Senior, and Mary Day, husband and wife, to file an action against the United States District Court, for the District of Rhode Island, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Confers jurisdiction upon the U.S. District Court for the District of Rhode Island to hear, determine, and render judgment on any claims of two named individuals for money damages arising out of the death of their son, allegedly improperly diagnosed or treated by the U.S. Navy.

titles.title: A bill to permit Charles E. Day, Senior, and Mary Day, husband and wife, to file an action against the United States District Court, for the District of Rhode Island, and for other purposes.
